TestCase.name: testFennelSortRule
TestCase.Resource: select * from sales.depts order by deptno
SortRel(sort0=[$0]) ProjectRel(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, DEPTS]])
FennelSortRel(key=[[0]], discardDuplicates=[false]) ProjectRel(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, DEPTS]])

TestCase.name: testFennelCartesianJoinRule
TestCase.Resource: select 1 from sales.emps,sales.depts
ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[1]) JoinRel(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, EMPS]]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, DEPTS]])
ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[1]) FennelCartesianProductRel(leftouterjoin=[false]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, EMPS]]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, DEPTS]])

TestCase.name: testFennelAggRule
TestCase.Resource: select deptno from sales.depts group by deptno
ProjectRel(DEPTNO=[$0]) AggregateRel(groupCount=[1]) ProjectRel($f0=[$0]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, DEPTS]])
ProjectRel(DEPTNO=[$0]) FennelAggRel(groupCount=[1]) FennelSortRel(key=[[0]], discardDuplicates=[false]) ProjectRel($f0=[$0]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, DEPTS]])

TestCase.name: testFtrsTableAccessRule
TestCase.Resource: select deptno from sales.depts
ProjectRel(DEPTNO=[$0]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, DEPTS]])
ProjectRel(DEPTNO=[$0]) FtrsIndexScanRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, DEPTS]], projection=[*], index=[SYS$CONSTRAINT_INDEX$DEPTS$SYS$PRIMARY_KEY], preserveOrder=[false])

TestCase.name: testFtrsScanToSearchRule
TestCase.Resource: select * from sales.depts where deptno=5
ProjectRel(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) FilterRel(condition=[=($0, 5)]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, DEPTS]])

ProjectRel(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) FtrsIndexSearchRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, DEPTS]], projection=[*], index=[SYS$CONSTRAINT_INDEX$DEPTS$SYS$PRIMARY_KEY], uniqueKey=[false], preserveOrder=[false], outer=[false], inputKeyProj=[[1, 3]], inputJoinProj=[[]], inputDirectiveProj=[[0, 2]]) FennelValuesRel(tuples=[[{ '[', 5, ']', 5 }]])

TestCase.name: testFtrsTableProjectionRule
TestCase.Resource: select name from sales.emps
ProjectRel(NAME=[$1]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, EMPS]])
FtrsIndexScanRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, EMPS]], projection=[[1]], index=[EMPS_UX], preserveOrder=[false])

TestCase.name: testFennelToIteratorConverterRule
TestCase.Resource: select upper(name) from sales.emps
ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[UPPER($1)]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, EMPS]])

IterCalcRel(expr#0..9=[{inputs}], expr#10=[UPPER($t1)], EXPR$0=[$t10]) FennelToIteratorConverter FtrsIndexScanRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, EMPS]], projection=[*], index=[SYS$CONSTRAINT_INDEX$EMPS$SYS$PRIMARY_KEY], preserveOrder=[false])

TestCase.name: testHeterogeneousConversion
TestCase.Resource: select upper(name) from sales.emps union all select lower(name) from sales.emps
UnionRel(all=[true]) ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[UPPER($1)]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, EMPS]]) ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[LOWER($1)]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, EMPS]])

UnionRel(all=[true]) IterCalcRel(expr#0..9=[{inputs}], expr#10=[UPPER($t1)], EXPR$0=[$t10]) FennelToIteratorConverter FtrsIndexScanRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, EMPS]], projection=[*], index=[SYS$CONSTRAINT_INDEX$EMPS$SYS$PRIMARY_KEY], preserveOrder=[false]) FennelCalcRel(expr#0..9=[{inputs}], expr#10=[LOWER($t1)], EXPR$0=[$t10]) FtrsIndexScanRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, EMPS]], projection=[*], index=[SYS$CONSTRAINT_INDEX$EMPS$SYS$PRIMARY_KEY], preserveOrder=[false])

TestCase.name: testMergeFilterWithJoinCondition
TestCase.Resource: select d.name as dname,e.name as ename from sales.emps e inner join sales.depts d on e.deptno=d.deptno where d.name='Propane'

ProjectRel(DNAME=[$11], ENAME=[$1]) FilterRel(condition=[=($11, _ISO-8859-1'Propane')]) JoinRel(condition=[=($2, $10)], joinType=[inner]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, EMPS]]) TableAccessRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, DEPTS]])

IterCalcRel(expr#0..11=[{inputs}], DNAME=[$t11], ENAME=[$t1]) FennelToIteratorConverter FennelCalcRel(expr#0..11=[{inputs}], expr#12=[=($t2, $t10)], expr#13=[_ISO-8859-1'Propane'], expr#14=[=($t11, $t13)], expr#15=[AND($t12, $t14)], proj#0..11=[{exprs}], $condition=[$t15]) FennelCartesianProductRel(leftouterjoin=[false]) FtrsIndexScanRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, EMPS]], projection=[*], index=[SYS$CONSTRAINT_INDEX$EMPS$SYS$PRIMARY_KEY], preserveOrder=[false]) FtrsIndexScanRel(table=[[LOCALDB, SALES, DEPTS]], projection=[*], index=[SYS$CONSTRAINT_INDEX$DEPTS$SYS$PRIMARY_KEY], preserveOrder=[false])
